text: "Set the Controls for the Heart" is a 1968 song by Pink Floyd. It was written by Roger Waters and is the third track from their second studio album A Saucerful of Secrets. It was also used on their live album Ummagumma. It was meant to be released as a single but it was vetoed by the band. ==References== Category:1968 songs Category:Space rock songs Category:Pink Floyd songs
title: Set the Controls for the Heart of the Sun
